name: 40 Games In One
description:
40 Games In One Is Game Pack With A variety Of Games From Sport,Shooter,Platformer,& Others.The Games Are Casual Games But Are Fun & Are Most High Score Based Games.What Makes The Game Is Exciting Is There Are Variety Of Games In Different Gaming genres.

The Games Included Are

Slice Fruit 2-4
FPS Zombies
5 Questions Part 1-5
Bowling Pins Attack 1-3
Footy Bowling
Retro 2048
Retro Baseball
Football Saves 2
SuperHeroes Crossy Train
Cricket Champions
Break The Wall
Lorry Race
Flappy Paper Plane
Flappy Football
Space Invaders
Ping Pong Attack 3D
Ping Pong Attack 3
Block Jump
Mobile Pong
Pole Jump
Ball Chase 3-4
& More
